entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Port-Menier
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:10 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port Menier 01:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: -13.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -16.6°C
Wind: E 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow changing to rain late in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 20 to 30 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 near noon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Rain ending late in the evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming west 40 gusting to 60 in the evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 13.
